import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import styles from '../styles/CigarCard.module.css' import { HiOutlineDotsVertical } from 'react-icons/hi' import MenuBtn from './MenuBtn' const CigarCard = (props) => { const { brand, name, description, img, rating } = props return (

{brand}

{name}

} />

{description}

Rating: {rating}/5

) } export default CigarCard
